title: Classical Homeopathy and Cranial Osteopathy - Domenick J. Masiello, DO
description: Dr. Masiello offers an integration of classical homeopathy and cranial osteopathy. In-Person and telemedicine visits available.
cleaned_text: Holistic Family Medicine About The Practice Dr. Masiello is a classical homeopath and a cranial osteopath, licensed in New York, New Jersey and Connecticut. From his office in Ridgefield, Connecticut, Dr. Masiello provides in-person visits for patients in the NYC metro area and multiple counties in southeastern New York and southwestern Connecticut. He provides [telemedicine services](/homeopathy-telemedicine-nyc-nj-ct-patients/) to patients who reside anywhere in New York, New Jersey and Connecticut. He is board certified in Homeopathy and Osteopathic Manipulation. He treats adults and children of all ages. Why Should You Choose Classical Homeopathy? Homeopathy uses the language of the patient's symptoms in selecting the best medicine for the patient. The classical or traditional homeopathic method focuses on all of the patient's symptoms and not just the patient's diagnosis. One remedy is prescribed at any given time so that it's effects can be monitored. [Learn more about classical homeopathy...](/homeopathy-overview/) Why Should You Choose Cranial Osteopathy? There are several models of osteopathic treatment, however, cranial osteopathy is the most inclusive, using subtle and sometimes near body techniques to free restrictions in the human energy field.
